questions.question: Which of the following statements accurately describe the classical information flow model in IoT solutions?
options: The model follows a linear input-process-output (I-P-O) structure.
Sensors act as both input and output devices in all IoT solutions.
IoT processing occurs only in the cloud, not locally.
Actuators provide output based on computed decisions or human interaction.
Information flow in IoT solutions may require intermediary hubs or gateways.
